DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy combination product contain ibuprofen 400 mg caffeine 100 mg versus either ingredient alone well placebo treatment post-surgical dental pain eight-hour period follow single dose study medication ( study stage 1 ) . A secondary objective evaluate efficacy multiple dos combination comparison ibuprofen alone 5-day post-surgical period ( study stage 2 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Ibuprofen Caffeine Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Males females 18 55 year age ; Outpatients schedule undergo surgical extraction 34 impacted third molar ( ) , minimum two mandibular extraction . The two mandibular third molar may partial bony impaction full bony impaction ( long trauma rating severe surgeon feel subject extreme postsurgical pain ) OR may combination one full bony impaction second mandibular soft tissue impaction partial bony impaction . Maxillary third molar ( supernumerary teeth ) type extract ; Use follow preoperative medication ( ) / anesthetic ( ) : topical benzocaine , shortacting local anesthetic ( mepivacaine lidocaine ) without vasoconstrictor and/or nitrous oxide ; Reliable , cooperative , adequate intelligence record request information analgesic questionnaire form ; Examined attend oral surgeon physician medically clear participate study ; Scheduled undergo qualify surgical procedure ; In good general health , BMI 30 less , contraindication study medication anesthetic drug ; Subjects least categorical pain score moderate numerical rating scale ( NRS ) score 5 great within 4.5 hour time last suture . Exclusion criterion : Presence serious medical condition ( e.g. , poorly control hypertension , poorly control diabetes , significantly impaired cardiac , renal hepatic function , hyper hypothyroidism ) ; Use prescription nonprescription drug administration ibuprofen non steroidal anti inflammatory caffeine contraindicate ; Acute local infection time surgery could confound postsurgical evaluation ; Females pregnant , lactate , childbearing potential , postmenopausal less 2 year use medically approve method contraception ( i.e. , oral , transdermal , intravaginal implanted contraceptive , intrauterine device , diaphragm , condom , abstinence , surgical sterility ) , females test positive urinebased pregnancy test ; Presence history ( within 2 year enrollment ) bleed disorder ( ) peptic ulcer disease ; History alcoholism substance abuse within last year , currently abuse alcohol moodaltering drug ( e.g. , cannabis ) . Subjects take central nervous system psychotropic drug ( include St. Johns Wort , nutritional supplement know psychotropic effect ) may enrol stable dos medication least 2 month , maintain dose throughout study , condition judge Principal Investigator wellcontrolled ; Habituation analgesic drug caffeine ( i.e. , routine use oral analgesic 5 time per week ingestion 4 caffeinecontaining drink daily ) ; use `` high energy '' drink per week ; Use type systemic corticosteroid within past 30 day history current previous use anabolic steroid ; History allergic reaction ( e.g. , asthma , rhinitis , swell , shock , hive ) acetaminophen , ibuprofen , naproxen , aspirin , celecoxib , non steroidal anti inflammatory caffeine ; Prior use type analgesic non steroidal anti inflammatory within 5 halflives drug surgery , except preanesthetic medication anesthesia procedure ; Ingestion caffeinecontaining beverage , chocolate , alcohol 6 hour less surgery ; Has impair liver function , e.g. , serum Alanine transaminase , aspartate aminotransferase , alkaline phosphatase , Gammaglutamyltransferase great 2.5 time upper limit normal , blood urea nitrogen , creatinine , bilirubin great 1.5 time upper limit normal without know benign explanation ; Has know history positive HIV antibody test know HIV infection ; Has know history Hepatitis B C ; Has clinically significant abnormal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) screening determine Investigator : Has take investigational product within past 30 day ; Has previously enter study ; The subject member study site staff either directly involved study , employee Sponsor , relative study site personnel directly involve study Sponsor .
